function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Younger individuals losing interest in COVID-19 news","Impact":"Reduced adherence to public health measures","Mitigation":"Implement targeted messaging and education campaigns for younger individuals","Technologies":"Social media platforms for targeted messaging","People":"Younger individuals","Owner":"Public health organizations"},{"Description":"Greater post-traumatic stress symptoms associated with decreasing interest in COVID-19 news","Impact":"Increased avoidance of public health information","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and stress management resources","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for remote mental health support","People":"General population","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Prolonged exposure to negative news about COVID-19 causing desensitization","Impact":"Decreased perception of risk and avoidance behavior","Mitigation":"Promote balanced and accurate reporting, limit exposure to distressful content","Technologies":"Media content moderation tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Media organizations"}]}
